traits.name: Boulder Guise
entries: While fully withdrawn into its shell, the geonid can't see and is indistinguishable from a small boulder

actions.name: Club
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Stone Tell
entries: The geonid touches a stone object or surface and knows what types of creatures have been within 10 feet of that stone in the past 24 hours. The geonid can also determine the number of creatures of each type, but not their identities.
